io.github.trulyfree.easyaspi.lib.io

Class FileHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.trulyfree.easyaspi.lib.io.FileHandler

  • public class FileHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class which aids in File IO with relation to EasyAsPi. You do not have to use this class.
    Since:
    v0.0.1-alpha
    Author:
    vtcakavsmoace

    • Field Summary

      The activity which owns this FileHandler.

      Characters which may not be found within filenames.

      • FileHandler

    • Method Detail

      • writeFile

        public void writeFile(@NonNull
                      java.lang.String content,
                      @Nullable
                      Callback callback,
                      @NonNull
                      java.lang.String appdir,
                      @NonNull
                      java.lang.String... path)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Writes a String to a File at the specified path.
        Parameters:
        content - String to write to the disk.
        callback - Callback instance for progress updates on the write operation.
        appdir - The application subdirectory in which to place it.
        path - The subdirectories beneath the appdir, ending with the target file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the writing process fails.

      • writeFile

        Writes a String to a specified File.
        Parameters:
        content - String to write to the disk.
        callback - Callback instance for progress updates on the write operation.
        target - The target file to write to.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the writing process fails.

      • writeFile

        public void writeFile(@NonNull
                      java.io.InputStream input,
                      @Nullable
                      Callback callback,
                      boolean append,
                      @NonNull
                      java.lang.String appdir,
                      @NonNull
                      java.lang.String... path)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Writes content read from an InputStream to a file at a specified path.
        Parameters:
        input - The InputStream to read from.
        callback - Callback instance for progress updates on the write operation.
        append - Whether or not to append to the target file.
        appdir - The application subdirectory in which to place it.
        path - The subdirectories beneath the appdir, ending with the target file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the writing process fails.

      • deleteFile

        public boolean deleteFile(@NonNull
                          java.io.File file)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Deletes a File instance. If that File is a folder, it will delete its submembers first.
        Parameters:
        file - File to delete.
        Returns:
        success Success or failure of the deletion process.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the reading process fails.

      • generateFile

        Parameters:
        appdir - The application subdirectory in which to locate the target file.
        path - The subdirectories beneath the appdir, ending with the target file.
        Returns:
        target The File at the specified location.
